mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CH_USER ( USER_CODE, USER_NM, GENDER, ZONE, DEPT, BIRTHDAY, MOBILE, EMAIL, BAPTISM, DUTY, GUIDE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, PHONE, COMP_ZIPCODE, COMP_ADDRESS, COMP_PHONE, COMP_NM, COMP_POSITION, RMK, CR_ID, CR_DT ) VALUES ( (SELECT USER_CODE FROM(SELECT CONCAT('CU',LPAD(IFNULL(SUBSTR(MAX(USER_CODE),3,4),0) + 1, 4, 0)) AS USER_CODE FROM CH_USER) A), #{frm_user_nm}, IFNULL(#{frm_gender},''), IFNULL(#{frm_zone},''), IFNULL(#{frm_dept},''), IFNULL(#{frm_birthday},''), IFNULL(#{frm_mobile},''), IFNULL(#{frm_email},''), IFNULL(#{frm_baptism},''), IFNULL(#{frm_duty},''), IFNULL(#{frm_guide},''), IFNULL(#{frm_zipcode},''), IFNULL(#{frm_address},''), IFNULL(#{frm_phone},''), IFNULL(#{frm_comp_zipcode},''), IFNULL(#{frm_comp_address},''), IFNULL(#{frm_comp_phone},''), IFNULL(#{frm_comp_nm},''), IFNULL(#{frm_comp_position},''), IFNULL(#{frm_rmk},''), IFNULL(#{SESS_EMAIL},'TEST'), NOW() );
